title: China upholds peaceful negotiation in disputes handling: military official
text: BEIJING - China always insists on resolving divergence and disputes through friendly negotiations with parties directly concerned and will try utmost to avoid unexpected conflicts, a senior Chinese military official said Saturday. China has
